# API Reference

Public symbols from the `gdmesh` package.

::: gdmesh
    options:
      show_root_heading: false
      show_symbol_type_heading: true
      members:
        - Mesh
        - load_mesh
        - MmgOptions
        - Plotter
        - PairIdCoord
        - Points
        - get_boundary_edges
        - getBoundaryEdges
